item.description:
Intuitive Eating with Jean Garofoli, RD, MPH

Our monthly meetings include a potluck lunch from 11:30 - 12:30 pm and a presentation from 12:30 - 1:30 pm.

Let us know what you'll bring to the potluck when you RSVP

$10 Meetup fee

Intuitive Eating
Presented by Jean Garofoli RD, MPH

In this one hour session, the participant will learn why the dieting process has failed with over 95% of the time weight is regained. The holistic conceptual framework of Intuitive Eating will be presented along with an overview of the 10 Key Principles on how to become an intuitive eater. Participants will be guided through a practice to determine if they are eating intuitively and then explore different types of ‘unconscious eating’. The intuitive eater is awakened gradually in six stages through learning the principles and then internalizing them through practices. We will explore these stages and experience one of the many practices during this session.
item.name: September Boston Area Mind-Body Therapies Meetup
